function checkStringAgainstNumber(string,num){if(string.length>num){return true;}else{return false;}}var MAX_CARD_CHARACTERS=240;// eslint-disable-next-line
var EMAIL_REGEX=/^(([^<>()\[\]\\.,;:\s@"]+(\.[^<>()\[\]\\.,;:\s@"]+)*)|(".+"))@((\[[0-9]{1,3}\.[0-9]{1,3}\.[0-9]{1,3}\.[0-9]{1,3}\])|(([a-zA-Z\-0-9]+\.)+[a-zA-Z]{2,}))$/;export{checkStringAgainstNumber,MAX_CARD_CHARACTERS,EMAIL_REGEX};
